## Overview
This report renders the primary and secondary analyses defined in the 10.22.2025 SAP.

## Primary Results
```{r}
irr <- readr::read_csv('outputs/tables/primary_irr.csv', show_col_types = FALSE)
knitr::kable(irr, caption = 'Primary IRR (LGBTQ vs Cis-Het)')
```

## Secondary (Cox)

